SELECT /* com.at.apcss.co.sys.mapper.LoginMapper.actionLogin */ CU.USER_ID AS ID , CU.USER_NM AS NAME --, CU.PSWD AS PASSWORD , NULL AS PASSWORD , CU.USER_ID AS USER_ID --, CU.PSWD AS PSWD , NULL AS PSWD , CU.USER_TYPE AS USER_TYPE , CU.USER_STTS AS USER_STTS , CU.EML AS EMAIL , CU.TELNO AS TELNO , CU.APC_CD AS APC_CD , CU.BRNO AS BRNO , CU.ADDR AS ADDR , CU.FRMER_SN AS FRMER_SN , (SELECT FN_GET_APC_NM(CU.APC_CD) FROM DUAL) AS APC_NM , (SELECT X.APC_SE_CD FROM TB_APC_EVRMNT_STNG X WHERE X.APC_CD = CU.APC_CD) AS APC_SE_CD
, CU.CHRGD_CERT_YN AS CHRGD_CERT_YN , CU.CHRGD_CERT_TYPE AS CHRGD_CERT_TYPE , CU.LGN_FAIL_NMTM AS LGN_FAIL_NMTM , CU.END_LGN_DT AS END_LGN_DT , CU.END_LGN_IP AS END_LGN_IP , CU.DEL_YN AS DEL_YN
, CU.CLNT_CD AS CLNT_CD , CU.CORP_CD AS CORP_CD , CU.USER_CTRGY AS USER_CTRGY , CU.EMP_CD AS EMP_CD , CU.DEPT_CD AS DEPT_CD , CU.HRM_MNGR_YN AS HRM_MNGR_YN , CU.HRM_EVL_ROLE AS HRM_EVL_ROLE , CU.HRM_PAY_MNGR_YN AS HRM_PAY_MNGR_YN , CU.ACNTG_MNGR_YN AS ACNTG_MNGR_YN
, CU.UNTY_OGNZ_ID AS UNTY_OGNZ_ID , CU.UNTY_OGNZ_TYPE AS UNTY_OGNZ_TYPE , CU.UNTY_AUTHRT_TYPE AS UNTY_AUTHRT_TYPE , CU.UNTY_AUTHRT_MNG_YN AS UNTY_AUTHRT_MNG_YN
FROM TB_COM_USER CU WHERE CU.USER_ID = #{id} AND CU.PSWD = #{password} -- AND CU.USER_STTS = '01' -- 사용자 상태: 01 사용 AND CU.DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT /* com.at.apcss.co.sys.mapper.LoginMapper.actionSSOLogin */ CU.USER_ID AS ID , CU.USER_NM AS NAME --, CU.PSWD AS PASSWORD , NULL AS PASSWORD , CU.USER_ID AS USER_ID --, CU.PSWD AS PSWD , NULL AS PSWD , CU.USER_TYPE AS USER_TYPE , CU.USER_STTS AS USER_STTS , CU.EML AS EMAIL , CU.TELNO AS TELNO , CU.APC_CD AS APC_CD , CU.BRNO AS BRNO , (SELECT FN_GET_APC_NM(CU.APC_CD) FROM DUAL) AS APC_NM , (SELECT X.APC_SE_CD FROM TB_APC_EVRMNT_STNG X WHERE X.APC_CD = CU.APC_CD) AS APC_SE_CD
, CU.CHRGD_CERT_YN AS CHRGD_CERT_YN , CU.CHRGD_CERT_TYPE AS CHRGD_CERT_TYPE , CU.LGN_FAIL_NMTM AS LGN_FAIL_NMTM , CU.END_LGN_DT AS END_LGN_DT , CU.END_LGN_IP AS END_LGN_IP , CU.DEL_YN AS DEL_YN
, CU.CLNT_CD AS CLNT_CD , CU.CORP_CD AS CORP_CD , CU.USER_CTRGY AS USER_CTRGY , CU.EMP_CD AS EMP_CD , CU.DEPT_CD AS DEPT_CD , CU.HRM_MNGR_YN AS HRM_MNGR_YN , CU.HRM_EVL_ROLE AS HRM_EVL_ROLE , CU.HRM_PAY_MNGR_YN AS HRM_PAY_MNGR_YN , CU.ACNTG_MNGR_YN AS ACNTG_MNGR_YN
, CU.UNTY_OGNZ_ID AS UNTY_OGNZ_ID , CU.UNTY_OGNZ_TYPE AS UNTY_OGNZ_TYPE , CU.UNTY_AUTHRT_TYPE AS UNTY_AUTHRT_TYPE , CU.UNTY_AUTHRT_MNG_YN AS UNTY_AUTHRT_MNG_YN
FROM TB_COM_USER CU WHERE CU.USER_ID = #{id} AND CU.USER_STTS = '01' -- 사용자 상태: 01 사용 AND CU.DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT /* com.at.apcss.co.sys.mapper.LoginMapper.searchId */ CU.USER_ID AS ID FROM TB_COM_USER CU WHERE CU.USER_NM = #{name} AND CU.EML = #{email} AND CU.USER_STTS = '01' -- 사용자 상태: 01 사용 AND CU.DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT /* com.at.apcss.co.sys.mapper.LoginMapper.searchPassword */ CU.USER_ID AS ID , CU.PSWD AS PASSWORD FROM TB_COM_USER CU WHERE CU.USER_ID = #{id} AND CU.EML = #{email} AND CU.USER_STTS = '01' -- 사용자 상태: 01 사용 AND CU.DEL_YN = 'N'
